Posts.Content: I was diagnosed with breast cancer, grade 2 invasive ductal carcinoma, ER and PR positive, HER2/neu negative, 0/1 sentinel lymph node. Already had a surgery and my cancer was removed completely. For chemo , my oncologist did Oncotype Dx and Li-67. my Oncotype Dx recurrent score 26 and Ki67 is 11%. so want to know whether chemo will be beneficial in my case.
Posts.Title: want to know whether chemo will be beneficial in my case

Posts.Content: Hi, thanks for your reply. I had been recommended not have chemo by my oncologist. As you have mentioned that we are not experts so I have decided to go-ahead with the decision of my oncologist. Hope all works fine for me. Now I am having my radiotherapy treatment alongside with Tamoxifen.
Posts.Title: want to know whether chemo will be beneficial in my case
